definitions.title: coll. reeds, rushes
definitions.body: (Aram. [[אַחְוׇא]], orig. Egypt., cf. demot. axu̇ fr. ȧxȧ be green, v. Ebers:AG & BB Mos. 338; Wied:Sammlung 16) Ge 41:2, Ge 41:18 (E) Job 8:11; also Ho 13:15 where rd. [[אָחִים]] pl. for [[אֲחָוִים]] (cf. AW), or fr. a parall. form [[[אָחֶה]]], v. De:Compl. Var. 23 f.
